column2:
This
email is sent to Showroom Admins when Site Admin contact them through emails or
messages.

column1: Hold down the CTRL key to select or de-select specific Store Status for which Admins of corresponding Stores need to be sent emails.
column2: Hold down the CTRL key to select or de-select specific Showroom Status for which Admins of corresponding Showrooms need to be sent emails.

column1: Hold down the CTRL key to select or de-select specific Store Status for which Admins of corresponding Stores need to be sent messages.
column2: Hold down the CTRL key to select or de-select specific Showroom Status for which Admins of corresponding Showrooms need to be sent messages.
